ORIGAM Documentation : DecodeShortMessagesFromBuffer Method

Created by Rita Vavrdová, last modified by Tomáš Vavrda on Oct 02, 2014

You can use this method if you obtain a PDU encoded SMS messages in a buffer. You will typically use this method after reading data from the mobile phone using the SerialPortCommunicationService.

The method returns decoded SMS messages.

Parameters

ParameterTypeDescription
BufferContext Store ReferenceA buffer with PDU encoded SMS messages.
